website_summaries.verdict: A custom towing mirror that works great with a wide range of trailers and campers.
pros: Snaps onto a vehicle's original mirror for seamless installation
Boasts an aerodynamic design that results in an unobstructed view for safer towing
Mirror's housing is rugged, and the mirror's glass is scratch-resistant
Fits Dodge, Ford, Chevy, and Toyota models
cons: Mirror tends to rattle when vehicle is moving at a high speed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 2014 F150... I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for 2014 F150. Just did our 1st 33' RV tow to Florida. The RV is a good foot wider than my truck on both sides. These mirrors were great for being able to view the next lane behind either side of the RV. They snapped on and off easily. No vibrations during travel. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Works with OEM Power Fold-in Mirrors
customer_reviews.text: These "Fit System 81810 Towing Mirrors" fit my 2011 F-150 Lariat Limited perfectly. It was good to find that these worked just fine with the power fold-in mirrors! So I can leave them on, and fold in the mirrors to fit the truck through the garage door. They seem to be well made. I have always used mirror extensions when towing with my other vehicles and find it makes a big difference when attempting lane changes while towing a boat or camper.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burg

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use on my 2013 F-150 towing a 27 foot Keystone Outback travel trailer. They fit perfectly, look like factory options, and work great once you get them aligned. I drove from Denver to Nashville towing my trailer and they were worth their weight in gold. I removed them last night and they left no marks on the factory mirrors! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, easy to install/remove, but I don't use them anymore...
customer_reviews.text: The way these attach is great. Easy on / off. I used mine on a 5,000 mile trip to Canada and back. When I removed mine, I had no damage to my painted FX4 mirrors. Happy about that. The drivers mirror does help and is pretty steady. The passenger mirror is worthless. the magnification on it is off (too much?) and with the little bit of vibration you get, renders the image useless. I've learned to use my stock mirrors and I haven't used these since.
customer_reviews.author: RedAggie03

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirrors for 2013 Ford F-150 XLT
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors easily install over my OEM mirrors on my truck in 10 seconds. To install, you start inserting the top, then pull down and clip on the bottom. They are secure and do not move even when driving 75 mph on the hiway. They look natural because the color blends so good with the color of the mirrors. Had a few friends ask me about them and they said that they would be buying them as well. The outside mirror can be moved up, down, in and out and will stay in place as you need it. If it does move, you can use a small screwdriver to tighten the screw. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Breedlove

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mirrors.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 2013 F150. Super easy to install and remove. Matches so well you can't tell they aren't original. All lights are still visible, and they don't interfere with the power folding. On rough roads the mirror does shake a bit, but not to the point where you can't see what's in the lane. But 90% of the time there is no shaking at all. Overall I am extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only driver side mirror is worth installing.
customer_reviews.text: Good.....Fit is excellent and mirrors look good. Size decent, could be a bit larger. The driver side mirror is a big help. Bad..... nothing about the passenger side mirror is useful. It looks like a magnifying small makeup mirror and is more of a distraction than a help. The objects seem too close and shaky. This would be an awesome product if this mirror was like the stock paasenger mirrors on vehicles and made objects smaller than they really appear.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install...useless for a 30ft travel trailer
customer_reviews.text: These installed in about 2 seconds, they snap right on and do look like factory mirrors. Theres a pretty noticable vibration once you get above about 60mph. Like another viewer mentioned, the magnification is VERY high so do not use these for passing. Unfortunately, these do not stick out far enough to really be of any use for our 30+ft travel trailer. I can't really see any more than I can with the factory mirrors and will probably send these back.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bargain superior fit and finish.
customer_reviews.text: Blown away by the fit and finish of this product. My father in law couldn't believe I paid 40 bucks for these mirrors. They work extremely well for what I need to tow my 23' travel trailer in my F150. Goes on and comes off easy but doesn't move once it's on.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Easy and inexpensive alternative to a new truck
customer_reviews.text: I was frustrated not being able to see around my travel trailer. The alternative of buying a $50,000 new truck with electronic folding tow mirrors was not an option. These work well on the drivers side. The passenger side is not quite as easy to see things as it is not a flat mirror. The view on the passenger side is distorted but allows you to see something coming up on that side. I find them easy to snap on and off. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tally

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Look and Fit but...
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 2013 Fort 150 perfectly. They go on easy and almost look like factory mirrors. The driver side mirror is fine but the passenger side is magnified. This might be good for backing up but not so good for driving. Cars behind the trailer can appear to be right next to the truck. The passenger mirror also vibrates a lot and the magnification probably makes it worse. The result is a blurry image. I think they are good enough to keep but if I had a redo I'd try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Dog

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 2013 F150 and they worked well. They go on tight and provide what you need to make it down the road and back. Very little vibration in the mirror but no more than what you get with factory tow mirrors as I have had them before. You don't get as much view as with factory tow mirrors but these worked really well for the price. I would recomme3nd to others. Easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: CM Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love them but not In Love with them
customer_reviews.text: These things are great because they are super easy to put on and take back off again. We store them in our camping trailer when we aren't pulling it. The down side is that the passenger towing mirror is a bit janky. It bounces around a lot and it is difficult to orient. Once you get used to it, it's OK. I think i'll use these for a while longer, but would like to upgrade to some real towing mirrors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2010 Ford F150 like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: I watched a couple youtube videos on towing mirrors before deciding to purchase these ones. The mirrors come in a nice carrying case that separates the two mirrors. They are very easy to put on by starting at the top and then going down. Had no issues going down the road as the mirrors did what they are intended to do. Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for real towing mirrors.
customer_reviews.text: The good first. They fit great, and are easy to install and remove. The drivers side mirror is helpful, but the passenger side is mostly useless. Since the factory mirror is convex to give a larger field of view, the manufacturer should’ve followed suit and made the towing mirror the same. Since the towing mirror is “normal” view it is very little help. I will keep these for emergencies until I can afford factory style towing mirrors
customer_reviews.author: NTMID8R

customer_reviews.title: Work great for our 2014 F-150
customer_reviews.text: The passenger side mirror is highly magnified, so really study the mirrors before you head out on your first trip pulling something. We put them on a week before our trip to get used to them. Once installed, which is so easy just snap and go, they look like they are part of the truck. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em.
customer_reviews.text: Snapped on my 2013 Ford F150 and went camping. No mirror vibration until around 80mph. Unless you look real close to the mirror side, you can't tell they're add-ons. Made one long 2500 mile trip and one short 50 trip with them. I do like the flat mirror on the passenger side. Makes it easier to back into a spot. Now I can see my wife trying to give me directions. I haven't taken them off yet because it gives a wider view. The only downside is a month after I purchased them, they dropped in price. I still recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: crazy dog robber

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design
customer_reviews.text: Great mirrors! Able to see the RV and the blind spots the stock mirrors had. They are sleek and look like they are factory mirrors. Easy to install and the snap into place. Drove over 10,000 miles and never had an issue-never came loose or moved.
customer_reviews.author: R1Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cool. Really allows a great view around my trailer. Installs in 10 seconds and DOES NOT scratch painted mirrors. Uninstalls in 5 seconds to stow away when leaving vehicle unattended. I really would not want to lose these to a roving mirror bandit so I take them off every time I leave my truck. Maybe that's the only downside... They would be easy to steal.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Misener BERDOO CA.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Towing
customer_reviews.text: These work great for towing with a 1/2 ton and not having to buy towing mirrors. I think 1/2 tons with tow mirrors look kinda funny. Only complaint is they have some vibration in the glass when driving. Definately help you see around your camper or enclosed trailer when towing.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Fits like a glove over my mirror
customer_reviews.text: These work the best. I had another set that had a plastic screw you had to use, they flew off when traveling down the highway. These are WAY better, snap on, and molded to fit. Great Product. Really great fit on my Ford F150 2010. I use them for pulling my 35' camper. I leave them on all the time now. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: J E

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror extenders
customer_reviews.text: These work exactly as advertised. Snap on easily to my 2014 F150 XLT and give me the extra mirrors I needed for towing my trailer. I have a tow package in the truck, have no idea why they didn't add trailer mirrors, but this took care of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lafollette

customer_reviews.title: these are an excellent alternative. I use these when moving my 8
customer_reviews.text: If you dont want the expense of getting normal tow mirrors, these are an excellent alternative. I use these when moving my 8.5x26' trailer or my boats. Gives me enough extra mirror to see down the sides which makes backing up and changing lanes much safer and easier. Worth every penny. PS, once you install these it will take a few attempts to get the mirrors aligned how you want them. When you go to take them off, avoid touching the mirrors so they dont move, so the next time you use them you can just clip them on and go.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Lundquist

customer_reviews.title: Now it is like having true towing mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2013 F150 perfectly and looks factory. I needed to be able to see around my 2014 35 foot Forest River rv. These mirror extensions did the job without the vibration that other customers unfortunately experienced. Before I bought these I was forced to slightly weave or waite until I went around a curve to see what and where obstickles was behind me. Now it is like having true towing mirrors. I like the idea that there is no type of strips to place between the two mirrors, but be sure to clean your vehicles mirror housings before installing. Any grit between the two could cause scratches to your factory housings.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror extensions
customer_reviews.text: These mirror extensions for trailer towing are great. Amazingly easy to install. Took a couple of minutes of in and out of the drivers seat to adjust the passenger side but that was expected. They fit securely. Looking forward to actually pulling my 20' trailer with my 2013 Ford F150. They even come with a bag to store them in when not in use. These are just flat mirror glass, not convex.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: A good short term fix
customer_reviews.text: I like the product idea. The good - easy on and easy off, nice to not have to fold up mirrors to get into the garage when not using them. The OK - I have used these previously but in an older model, the mirrors still have some annoying vibrations so don't expect factory clear viewing. I find that they don't quite let you see around 8 ft wide trailers, need a little more extension. I use these because they are inexpensive and removable but if you tow a lot you would want factory towing mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: Use on my 2010 f150 when towing the toyhauler takes a little getting used to but that might just be me, they really help when towing through big cities and when I get to where I'm going I leave them on because they almost look factory
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improved towing safety
customer_reviews.text: Delivered with the usual Amazon speed. Opened the box and immediately installed (less than 5 minutes). The tabs that lock it in place work great. These will not fall off. Towed my trailer using the mirror extenders which allowed me to see around the trailer improving my safety. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J Brady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trailering mirrors for my Lariat
customer_reviews.text: Holy snott! I cannot believe how great these look and work for $50. Perfect fit on my 2014 F-150 Lariat. They are easy to install, look factory and are really a plus when pulling my 14x7 tandem enclosed trailer. 2500 miles round trip to Key West with zero issue. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Ray Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Looks like they came from the factory.
customer_reviews.text: great looking product. I would highly recommend these for anyone who needs to tow an RV. Or any type of trailer. They look good. They work good. Function Like they should. They actually look so good, I just leave them on my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Metalbigman

customer_reviews.title: They work fine.
customer_reviews.text: They install super fast and easy. Come off just as easy. I just wish they were a little wider-- another foot would help with visibility. But no complaints. They were a LOT less expensive than replacement mirrors. If I were a full-time RVer I might want the factory style mirrors, but for part-timers like us these work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several styles of tow mirrors in the past. None have worked this well, easy to install with good build quality. I get little to no vibration and it makes it easy to see to the back of my 32' travel trailer. I have these on a 2011 Ford F150
customer_reviews.author: Marc A. Stedman

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and finish of these towing mirrors on my 2011 F150. They are just wide enough to see vehicles that are directly behind my camper. They hold their adjustments. They are very clear. They almost look a factory option. They don't interfere with my power folding function either. And they fit securely. Bottom line: I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Bill G Collins

customer_reviews.title: Super mirrors, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and easy off! These are much easier to use that my previous extension mirrors (less than 30 seconds). They come off so easy that they could be easily stolen. On the other hand, they are so easy to put on and off that I remove them if I am parked anyplace for any length of time. They come with a convenient carrying bag and look as if they are part of the original mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. LeDu

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: These slip-on mirrors fit perfectly on my 2014 F-150. At the price, they're a good deal, and they work fine. They will not blow off at high speed, but are easy to remove when needed. Nice design and good price.
customer_reviews.author: David G Doster

customer_reviews.title: I can see again!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing addition to my 2011 f150 for towing my 24' travel trailer. I can see to the end and behind on both sides now! They're for great and look built in. I saw these on another truck driving by and looked for them on Amazon right away. Spend the extra few bucks and get these, so much easier than straps and way better quality and safety.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Finster

customer_reviews.title: Work well, wish the mirrors were bigger
customer_reviews.text: They work well. Was worried about scratching up the original mirrors but it doesn't. Have to adjust every time you use them if you take them off in between. I do wish the mirrors were slightly larger but they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Alford

customer_reviews.title: Great item and fit
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box these fit like a glove and look fantastic. I installed them, adjusted them and they will definitely do the job while pulling my camper. I couldn’t be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo58

customer_reviews.title: An Inexpensive Solution With Shortcomings
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install except one of the tabs securing these to the mirrors broke. Still seems solidly mounted. Have no idea yet as to how they will be to remove. The passenger side mirror is flat. Being next to the curved mirror on that side, I am often left feeling cross-eyed.
customer_reviews.author: Guy A. Jett

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these mirrors in June for our 2010 Ford F 150 to use while pulling our 22 ft. travel trailer. In my opinion they were very much worth it. The mirrors allow you to see down the sides of your trailer mostly for quick glances for lane changes and the like. Some reviewers complained of vibration or mirror shakiness. We have so far not encountered that problem. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a very good product and does what it intends. This would be a 5 star review if they could make the following changes. Add some sort of tinting to the driver side mirror, similar to the factory mirror. This would cut down on the glare. Reduce the vibration that causes the mirror to shake.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit & Appearance
customer_reviews.text: I purchased model #81810 for my 2013 F-150 SuperCrew XLT 4x4. Outstanding fit and appearance. The forward sides do not look like add-ons like the CIPAs do (no tightening knob). The aft sides do because of the tabs (obviously), but appearance is good. The texture and finish match the factory mirrors perfectly. A casual observer looking from the front would probably think they are factory mirrors. None of the functional lights & reflectors are covered up. I haven't road tested them yet but I don't anticipate vibration because of the tight, glove-like fit. Great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a factory mirror
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure if this extended mirror will meet my expectations but I got surprised after install it, that is helping me when I’m pulling my 30 ft. long travel trailer; I really recommend this mirror to who that doesn’t want to expend hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Osmar Silva

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great add on mirrors for longer trailer towing. Pop on and off. Even included a bag for storage. Reasonable in price compared to switching out the entire mirror. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Neuesnchwander

customer_reviews.title: They look like they belong on the truck. No aftermarket look or feel to these mirrors.
customer_reviews.text: What a perfect fit for my Ford F150 Lariat. I was afraid it wouldn't work on my mirrors because of the chrome trim on the original equipment mirrors, but it installs easily and perfectly. It looks like original equipment and is rock solid at 70 MPH. The mirrors can still be folded in without removing the Towing Mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: excellent buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These came in less than 48 hours, and not only were they easy to install, but they fit like a glove. I couldn't be more pleased, and the fact that they weren't expensive was just icing on the cake. Quality was very good. Would recommend to anyone looking for an inexpensive solution to tow mirrors for trucks not equipped with the expandable factory mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: LIZ ROUDA

customer_reviews.title: Look great. Easy install 2012 f150 xlt
customer_reviews.text: Start at the top first. They slip right on and slip right off. They look great. Very solid and look oem on my 2012 f150 supercrew xlt! Very impressed. The only bummer was that I didn't have time to bs with friends and have a beer so my wife was happy with the install time
customer_reviews.author: J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors snapped into place and stayed there. No rattles, no wobbles, no problems. They came off as easily as they went on. I had no problems with the view in either mirror. Excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these mirrors.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these mirrors. We had a cheaper set and they worked good. They just were so bulky and definitely looked like something you placed on the truck. These look so natural and clip on so easy...on and off. So glad we went with these mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Airedale Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great mirrors.  Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: These extended mirrors install very easily and when properly adjusted allow you to see vehicles behind the trailer you're towing much better. Very ease to remove when not needed. Be careful and reset/adjust mirrors every time you remove and install them as chances are the mirror was bumped and is now misaligned. Overall very happy and use them everytime we pull our 26' travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Hollis211

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. Easy on easy off. Mirrors are a little small but you still use stock mirrors for blind spots. I pull my 8ft wide trailer with them. A bit hard to use when backing the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: skids

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 2013 Ford F150 4x4. I needed to pull an 18ft cargo trailer 2000 miles and the mirrors worked perfectly. They fit nice and tight over my existing mirrors. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: ldptex

customer_reviews.title: Slip on mirror fits 2013 F150 great
customer_reviews.text: Product fits 2013 F150 factory mirrors and does NOT block the turn signal or reflector on the front and back of my mirror. Adjustability was good. Must snug up set screw to help lazy mirror, but that was easy. Only draw back ... passenger mirror had a different magnification than the truck mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Ami N. Slater

customer_reviews.title: Great towing mirrors
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors fit seamlessly over the OEM mirrors on my 2013 F150. They look good and work great. Excellent product and value!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Easily taken on or off and adjusted
customer_reviews.text: Fits an ‘09 F150 perfectly and the drivers side is invaluable. Easily taken on or off and adjusted. Passenger mirror adds minor value but is better than a kick in the pants so I’ll give the set 5 stars. They match the black stock mirrors so they aren’t hideous either and the extensions have some ascetic appearance unlike other models available on the web.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Oligmueller

customer_reviews.title: Well Thought Out Product
customer_reviews.text: These look factory on my 2013 F150. So much nicer than the old rubber band models that were so difficult to adjust and ugly to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Fastnet

customer_reviews.title: You Will Not be Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: These towing mirrors fit like a glove! They are good quality and come with a carrying bag that has separate pockets for each mirror. They install easily and work very well. There is little to no movement of the mirror when going down the road, unlike some of the other strap-on type of mirrors. When they are installed, you can't really tell they are not part of the factory mirror. Very definitely recommend these to others looking to spend a fraction of the cost of permanently installed tow mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: It may work for some, but had to return ...
customer_reviews.text: It may work for some, but had to return it. If you tow a lot go ahead an but a true set of tow mirrors. The problem I had is I could never get it adjusted properly on the passenger side. So just replaced my stock mirror with power tow mirrors and I was in business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mirrors but could be larger.
customer_reviews.text: Very Easy to mount add on mirrors. A snap to put on or take off after use. Took off one star as the mirrirs are a bit small. Sjhould have made them the full height of mirrors on the truck so can see traffic and also see trailer tires when cornering with mirrors in one position. Found i had to choose which position i want to see most them move to see other while traveling. Overall nice product but larger mirror area would make it a five star product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the mirrors now
customer_reviews.text: Was no a snap on application for my truck .I have a 2013 f150 crew cab.XLT .My truck had a chrome piece on top of the mirror that was OEM from Ford.I had to remove the chrome piece then the mirrors went on with no problems .I am happy with the mirrors now.In addition my neighbor has a 2013 f150 without the chrome and they fit perfectly without alterations.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Scratch my side view mirror housing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy, scratched my side mirror housing!! Save your money up and buy aftermarket mirrors! Mirror moves in housing with bumpy highway driving constantly adjusting.
customer_reviews.author: Butlerseed

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! They don’t look like clip on mirrors, they look like that’s how the pickup came.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlee Walter

customer_reviews.title: Wont come off
customer_reviews.text: once you get it on, it does not come off. will need tobe broken to remove or i may damage the truck
customer_reviews.author: Ratsan

customer_reviews.title: Look good but lacks in fucntion
customer_reviews.text: The unit is lightweight and the fit is good, but the quality and strength not so good. The plastic material is thin and the mirror and mirror bracket is the weak point.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stillwell

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well and is Secure.
customer_reviews.text: We got this to use with our travel trailer. We looked at upgrading the OEM mirror but found it to be too costly. These were a great solution and fraction of the price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy May

customer_reviews.title: Nice extending mirrors
customer_reviews.text: It fits over my mirrors and works great on seeing what is in back of the traylor. It would be hard for these to fall off the way they mount.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Easy on&off yet fit snug and solid.
customer_reviews.text: Easy on&off yet fit snug and solid. They blend in nicely and look like they were meant to be there. Additional viewing angles/degrees work great for my camper trailer. I don't notice any wind noise, shaking, or vibrations at high speeds. Got for my 2011 F150.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN

customer_reviews.title: These worked great for towing my new 22 foot travel trailer
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for towing my new 22 foot travel trailer. My only complaint, and it is a minor one, is that the mirrors shake a little when driving. I am still able to see what is in my blind spot , it just takes an extra second to find what im looking for in the mirror due to the slight shaking. The fit over the factory mirrors is great and they look like they are a part of the truck. Very easy to get on and off the truck and the construction seems sturdy. I would recommend these to family or friends who are looking for towing mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not fit
customer_reviews.text: The box said for Ford F-150, Part number was for F-150, in comparison they fit a Dodge Ram 1500 and not my Ford. Having to return.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: But this is a great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: The items arrived promptly as described. However, before you buy, make sure you do not have after-market accessories on. I have chrome add-ons and this will not go over them. But this is a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: t_power

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Install was a snap, they clicked in place quick and provided enough extra line of site that it is much easier to see backing up my 26' camper. I take them off when not in use and just like the install they come right off, no fuss no muss. If you need just a little bit more extension from your non-towing mirrors these will do it. They don't extend out as far as my father's tow mirrors but I'm not stuck with tow mirrors without a trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and performance
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Fits perfectly. Very little shaking, even at freeway speeds. On a recent camping trip, I drove about 20 miles on a rough dirt road. The mirrors did great, didn't even have to re-adjust them.
customer_reviews.author: Edward T.

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror
customer_reviews.text: Fits good on my 2014 f150 3.5l. Little shaking going down the road but can live with a little.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This things work great. Very inexpensive way to see around a trailer. Easy to put on, use and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Jarod VandenHeuvel

customer_reviews.title: 2013 f150 fx4 mirrors. YES THEY FIT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of strap on tow mirrors. I was using a suction cup style and could not stand the look. then I found custom ones for ford but the company did not have any for the 2013 with fancy mirrors. they had for f150 but not with the blinkers in them. Then I found these and love them..... I put them on and they look awesome. They have cut out for blinkers and feel secure. I added a little more stick on padding inside the casing to prevent any scratching but they do come with some. what a great price too...
customer_reviews.author: JOHN J

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to more expensive mirrors. They were extremely helpful. They also look great.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Glover

customer_reviews.title: Fit system fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: My 2014 FX4 came fully equipped for towing, the only thing missing was towing mirrors. Found these that got good reviews and reasonably priced and decided to give them a shot. I couldn't be happier. Easily attached and does not scratch my painted mirrors. Does not interfere with the folding mirror option.
customer_reviews.author: ThomSak

customer_reviews.title: Look like factory installed
customer_reviews.text: They look factory on my 2014 F150. There is very minor vibration but it’s not enough to be a problem. Snap on in seconds and hold on tight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit on 2013 F150
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I used them in my 2013 F150. Fit on perfectly and stayed tight. Almost no shaking at 70 mph. They fit so good that I forgot to remove them when I parked the trailer and drove around with them for a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: EKD

customer_reviews.title: Nice price for a mirror extension
customer_reviews.text: Nice price for a mirror extension., Easy on, easy off. Slight vibration, but they do the job. Passenger side does not extend ad far as I would like, but that is more a result of the angle the F150 mirror than this mirror. More than adequate for hauling my travel trailer. We are new to this RV thing, so did not want to spend several hundred dollars for replacement mirrors, until we were sure RVing was for us. This were perfect for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: S. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Great for towing. The clip on easy and look good. Absolutely no bad opinions.
customer_reviews.author: Truck Guy

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Snap on easily, Fit nice and tight. They blend in and look OEM on the mirror as well. I do with the mirror was a little taller, but they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Super Stanchy Customs

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and they work great.
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are easy to put on and stay in place. I like that they are not permanent.
customer_reviews.author: azhunter

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Work great - we have put them on for towing our camper and just left them on because they look like they were part of the truck and we like them so much.
customer_reviews.author: ACMC

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and does not scratch the mirror underneath while traveling
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and does not scratch the mirror underneath while traveling. With these mounted I almost had full view behind my 35' travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila G.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these mirror extenders and they are perfect for my vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these mirror extenders and they are perfect for my vehicle. However I had installed chrome mirror covers and because of that they do not fit properly. They could still be used however I would want to secure them with a small piece of tape.
customer_reviews.author: William Weatherell

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice! These do not look aftermarket, they look Great! They install very quick - it takes more time to take them out of the box, and they do not move. I have had other mounting type of aftermarket towing mirrors - they ended up on the interstate. Regardless of the cost difference, it is worth purchasing these over the other options. I would recommend these to anyone looking for a quality aftermarket towing mirror.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again easily
customer_reviews.text: These work like a dream! Easiest extender mirrors we ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy PA

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but had to return because my mirrors were too big for them to fit. If I had the standard mirrors, then I think these add one with be a nice appearance.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Price was good, was a little wobbly even after tightening up ...
customer_reviews.text: Price was good, was a little wobbly even after tightening up the set-screw but overall it really extended what I could see while towing thereby greatly improving safety. They were worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You're gonna love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit! 2013 Ford F-150. Added about 4-5 inches of extended mirror to factory installed. If it wasn't for the snap tabs, you'd never know they were not one piece. Impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great add on mirrors for towing.
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Fits our Ford F-150 mirrors well and allows for the blinkers to show on the mirror. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: D Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Fit fine
customer_reviews.text: Extendable mirrors would be great.....but not at $500 + . These increase my rear visibility acceptably. Good value for what the do
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: works for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Shakes quite a bit but really only needed it for night towing since I have a 20ft travel trailer. No huge and ugly towing mirrors that I do not care for.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It works well for my F-150. I have not removed them yet, so not sure how easy they come off, but they went on easy. Once we finished the year hauling around our travel I just left them on, since they look so much like the factory mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Hot and cold

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it was from factory
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to take off, gives me a lot more vision when towing my 35 ft camper!
customer_reviews.author: David Grodhaus

customer_reviews.title: Grumpy dog
customer_reviews.text: Ez on Ez off doesn't look like add on's like some of the other one's you buy .good for the the occasional trip you take in your R V
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy dog

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than factory mirrors
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors look good. They almost look like part of the mirrors on the truck. Only problem is they vibrate more than expected. I really don't like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Bob F.

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect. Usability based on your truck
customer_reviews.text: The fit and removal is perfect. I just don't see much use here as my mirrors give me about the same view. I have the blind spot small mirrors as part of my regular mirrors and I can't see much more towing my boat using the extentions. Great product and good price, just not useful in my application.
customer_reviews.author: Funkyboer

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: 2013 F150. They fit nicely and they look good. The issue I have is that the mirrors are at a high magnification and don't really help too much. If they matched the magnification of the stock mirrors beside them they would be great. I leave them on when I tow however because they are basically better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Fit System 81810 Ford F-150 Towing Mirror - Pair
product_meta.description:
Fit System’s Towing Mirror Extensions are the most economical towing mirror option you can find. They are an excellent, safe solution for all your towing needs to increase visibility when on the road while towing. Fit System Towing Mirror Extensions increase the effectiveness of existing OEM side mirrors. Our mirror extensions are custom designed to fit a variety of popular truck and SUV models. Installation is a snap, and the mirrors do not detract from the appearance of your vehicle. The final look is truly professional and looks like it was designed for your truck or SUV.

Easy and effective extension of side mirrors EXTEND REAR VISIBILITY WHEN TOWING
Reduce your driving stress while towing. You will greatly improve your ability to change lanes, pass other vehicles and park your vehicle safely and effortlessly with the addition of our Fit System Custom Towing Mirrors. Towing incidents are quite common when pulling loads wider than your vehicle. These challenging hauling circumstances are why Fit Systems created and perfected our Towing Mirror line. For over 60 years we have provided solutions for the mirror industry and the past decade we have helped the Towing industry with our experience and knowledge. It is important to augment your existing side mirror line of sight. Our Custom Fit, aerodynamic design results in an unobstructed view for safer towing.

DURABLE CONSTRUCTION AND EASY INSTALLATION
Fit System’s Towing Mirror Extensions are designed to last for years. The housing is rugged and the glass is scratch-resistant. The installation of our towing mirror extensions is so simple. There are no holes to drill or additional parts needed when installing them. No hardware needed! Simply snap the mirror in place over your existing mirror. Once the towing mirrors are in place, the built-in clips will keep the towing mirror securely in place on your existing mirror until you decide to take them off. The custom design flawlessly matches the contour of your existing mirror. The result is a look and feel that is professional. From the front of the vehicle hardly anyone will be able to tell there are towing mirror extensions attached. From the inside of the vehicle, you will easily see the increased field of vision while towing. No chunky looks, no parts sticking out creating an eye sore. Form ever follows function with these custom fit towing mirrors. They are sleek, elegant and look like they came directly from the manufacturer. These custom towing mirrors are conveniently sold as a pair with installation instructions for installation demonstration.

ABOUT FIT SYSTEMS
Since 1950, as the leading manufacturer of vehicle mirrors, Fit Systems has been servicing the OE mirror industry and the replacement mirror aftermarket for over 60 years. Our car mirrors and truck mirrors can be found in numerous applications, and the Fit System name is one of the most recognizable brands on the market. Our diverse product line, which includes the automobile mirror, truck mirror, replacement glass and towing mirror segments, is manufactured under strict quality guidelines. We operate five factories worldwide that are ISO certified and follow QS 9000 standards. The Fit System, our OE replacement mirror program, covers over 2,700 vehicle applications and continues to grow. It is the largest program of its kind in the U. S. and Canada, and fulfills 87% of the aftermarket demand. We also manufacture universal mirrors for car, truck, SUV and van applications, as well as numerous interior and exterior accessories.


Fit System’s Towing Mirror Extensions are designed to fit seamlessly over standard factory side mirrors. Our Towing Mirrors fit Dodge, Ford, Chevy and Toyota models. The Fit System’s Towing Mirror Extensions are aerodynamic, elegant, and sleek and clip right over the factory mirror seamlessly. When clipped on these customs fit towing mirrors look as if they were manufactured as part of the original installed mirror. These mirrors feature an adjustable mirror that extends your towing vision without obstructing your existing mirror. The easy installation requires no tools and can be installed within 60 seconds. There are no holes to drill and they are a custom fit to your vehicle. Truly a factory look, feel and construction design. The mirror face is manufactured with scratch-resistant glass for many years of use. The materials used are designed for reliability. They can withstand years of use in all weather conditions. What are you waiting for? Try these top rated Towing Mirror Extensions from The Mirror People today!
